name: Infinite Arcana
summary:
Infinite Arcana is an action Roguelike mobile game with a fantasy adventure theme.
Fist to flesh, heart-piercing fighting, you may enjoy the best action experience.
Randomly generated maps and monsters, endless floating isles to be explored;
Interesting game modes with random character skill builds more than 100 styles.
The mystery of "Infinite Arcana" is waiting to be unraveled, and the eroded continent is calling for your rescue.
